DataElement.preferredDefinition: The start time of study treatment represented in an unambiguous time format (e.g.,., hh:mm:ss).

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Exposure as Collected Domain Start Time

ValueDomain.changeDescription: Elevated to Standard per governance approval by RA. 2021-6-9 ak. 12/18/18 TT released/MC.  11-19-18 TT added max length.  Created as part of CDISC mapping task. 6.22.18 mc

ReferenceDocuments.name: Case Report Form  Completion Instructions
ReferenceDocuments.description: Record the start time (as complete as possible) when administration of study treatment started.

ReferenceDocuments.name: ECSTDTC
ReferenceDocuments.description: This does not map directly to an SDTMIG variable. For the SDTM submission dataset, concatenate all collected CDASH START DATE and TIME components and populate the SDTMIG variable ECSTDTC in ISO 8601 format.

ReferenceDocuments.name: CDASH Implementation Notes
ReferenceDocuments.description: Recommend collecting the time a medication was started only when a protocol or data collection scenarios requires it. When collecting the time for an individual dose, the word "start" may be omitted from the Question Text and Prompt.

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 2
ReferenceDocuments.description: Time of cabozantinib administered on the day of this PK collection

ReferenceDocuments.name: COG CRF Text 3
ReferenceDocuments.description: Time of last dose cabozantinib  administered prior to PK collection
